price: 52. Iyo qolodii Nuux awal hore; waxay ahaayeen kuwo dulmi iyo xadgudub badan.
arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ هُمۡ أَظۡلَمَ وَأَطۡغَىٰ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqawma nūḥin min qablu innahum kānū hum aẓlama wa-aṭghā
